CustomField.description: Logical expressions which can be applied to Challenge Rewards. The expressions available are: "All" (it meets all the established Missions); "Any" (it meets at least one established Mission) and "Custom" (it enables creating a formula based on the established Mission. E.g. ((1 AND 2) OR 3).).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Logical expressions which can be applied to Challenge Rewards: "All" (it meets all the established Missions); "Any" (it meets at least one Mission) and "Custom" (it enables creating a formula based on the established Mission. E.g. ((1 AND 2) OR 3).).
CustomField.label: Match Missions
